name: Rawal Rumble - Prototype Demo
description:
This early demo features 1 stage, single player or 2P multiplayer and an unlockable Survival game mode on an unfinished WIP placeholder stage. The final game will feature 2 additional -female- characters, 10 stages, 4P multiplayer and several game modes.

Keys 1P: WASD (movement) + "J" (Punch), "K" (Kick), "L" (Jump)

Keys 2P: Arrow keys (movement + "/" (Punch), "*" (Kick), "-" (Jump) in num. keypad

Volume (in num, keypad) : "+" (Volume up), "." (Volume down) 

F7 (Debug, proto version only): Enables or disables CRT / scanlines effect. 

F4 (Debug, proto version only): Kills all enemies on screen (use it if an enemy got stuck outside screen, you can't kill him and can't continue.

Grab: Press forward+Punch when very close to an enemy (you can't grab purple enemies) when not performing a combo. Then Punch to Lift, or Kick to Knee.
